description: Devi`s Minun works for the All Service business in the Vermilion City area in the Kanto region. Plusle and Minun are the company`s mascots. They do everything from fixing pipes to caring for Pok√©mon. Devi`s Minun was a bit annoyed at Multa for contributing to Devi getting injured.
name: Minun (Divi)
